name: Dance! Dance! Spy computer
description:
What happen if A.I that use for spy in another computer.

She come to you and beg for help!

This game is in  JamDNA #9 challange .

It's first time for me to make game in 4 days.I feel amazing! (and want to sleep...)

How to play

-Press arrow keys to move NEKO-KORE . 

-When any alphabet key is overlaping her, press that key to collect the score. 

-The alphabet will change a color when it is overlapping.

Hint: Pressing the key when alphabet reach the middle of her body will result the best score.

use  left arrow, right arrow , WASD button and ENTER.

Have fun!!!
